title: Competitive Win-Back
description: A lead reveals they are currently using a competitor's product but are unhappy with it.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the customer's frustration and ask about the specific pain points with the competitor's product.
Use a competitive battlecard to highlight the product's advantages that directly address the customer's pain points.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent makes a compelling, targeted pitch against the competitor.

tasks.description: Offer a free trial and assistance with data migration to make switching easy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent lowers the barrier to entry for the customer to switch providers.
